      • addColumnToTableViewer

        public static void addColumnToTableViewer(TableViewer tableViewer,
                          java.lang.String text,
                          java.lang.Integer width)
        Parameters:
        tableViewer - The TableViewer that a column will be added to
        text - The name of the column. Will show up in the column header.
        width - If null, then pack() will be called. If a valid integer, then the column will have this width
